name: The Great Duckscape
description:
Submision for the Mini Game Jam 60

You are the mother of four, Quakers, Waddles, Puddles, and Dave.

Your home country has a poultry shortage, and people are demanding nuggets.

They begin to look for a new source for their nug-diction, and after enough hungry stares of the nugget deprived, you decide to flee to Duckmark.

However, you are a duck, which are famously not issued passports, and must migrate illegally through treacherous waters.

All you can do is hope that all your ducklings make it across safely.

BUTTONS

Move Up: W / UP arrow keys / UP dpad / UP left stick

Move Down: S / DOWN arrow keys / DOWN dpad / DOWN  left stick

Mothers Intuition: SHIFT / A / LEFT arrow / LEFT dpad / LEFT left stick / A button / B button

Pause: ESC / START
